jira.IssueApi.create_issue.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Jira service encountered an unexpected error while creating issue
Error 503: Service unavailable - The Jira service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
Error 408: Request timeout - The issue creation request timed out. Please try again.
Error 429: Rate limit exceeded - You have exceeded the maximum number of issue creations allowed. Please try again later.

jira.IssueApi.get_issue.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Jira service encountered an unexpected error while retrieving issue
Error 503: Service unavailable - The Jira service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
Error 408: Request timeout - The issue retrieval request timed out. Please try again.

jira.IssueApi.update_issue.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Jira service encountered an unexpected error while updating issue
Error 503: Service unavailable - The Jira service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
Error 408: Request timeout - The issue update request timed out. Please try again.
Error 409: Conflict - The issue has been modified by another user. Please refresh and try again.
